articles.description: Oregon guard Payton Pritchard takes it all the way to the cup for the lay-in.
articles.headline: Oregon's Pritchard beats the USC defense for fast-break layup

images.caption: Oregon guard Payton Pritchard takes it all the way to the cup for the lay-in.
images.name: Oregon's Pritchard beats the USC defense for fast-break layup

articles.description: Dachon Burke drilled 4 of 5 from deep to score 27 points and Robert Morris used a borrowed gym to open its final homestand of the season, walloping Bryant 83-60 in a Northeast Conference battle at Duquesne University Thursday night.
articles.headline: Robert Morris borrows Duquesne arena, wallops Bryant, 83-60

articles.description: Reggie Dillard scored 21 points with three 3-pointers, JC Younger added 17 points with four 3s, and Presbyterian beat High Point 69-62 on Thursday night to end a three-game skid.
articles.headline: Dillard scores 21, Presbyterian downs High Point 69-62

articles.description: Mike Morsell had 19 points and Brian Starr added 15 as Towson held Delaware to two points over the final four minutes to win 67-65 on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Towson defense holds off Delaware 67-65

articles.description: Jamaal King scored 26 points and Keith Braxton had 23 points to go with 14 rebounds as Saint Francis outlasted Central Connecticut 77-71 in overtime after blowing a 16-point lead on Thursday night.
articles.headline: King and Braxton combine to lead Red Flash to overtime win

articles.description: David Nichols scored 25 points, 19 in the second half, leading five into double figures and Albany defeated UMass Lowell 91-81 Thursday night, notching its fourth straight 20-win season.
articles.headline: Nichols leads Albany past UMass Lowell 91-81
